content: crochet mico the cute monkey with this free monkey crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners including full video tutorial you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini monkey from sport weight cotton yarn and a big one with chenille super bulky plush yarn link to written pattern free mico the monkey amigurumi crochet pattern 1 link to video free mico the monkey amigurumi video tutorial 2 1 https //www mariskavos nl/free-monkey-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/atev8bvnx8c
